alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Clay (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 12:56PM EST until January 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible with locally higher amounts possible on the highest peaks. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph which could lead to periodic blizzard like conditions with low visibility and blowing snow mainly above 4000 feet. * WHERE...Mountains of east Tennessee and southwest North Carolina. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and blowing snow with reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
